Serialized Form

  • Package &lt;Unnamed&gt;

    • Class SurrealeKausalitaet extends processing.core.PApplet implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • SHAPES_PER_USER

          int SHAPES_PER_USER
          Number of shapes per user

        • context

          SimpleOpenNI.SimpleOpenNI context
          The SimpleOpenNI context (Kinect sensor) for this program

        • scaleFactorX

          float scaleFactorX
          By converting rela world position to perspective positions the result is a vector within the kinect resolution of 640 * 480 pixels. This scaleFactor will be used to scale the x coordinate (between 0 and 640) to the display width (between 0 and displayWidth)

        • kinectIsConfigured

          boolean kinectIsConfigured
          Will be set on true as soon as the kinect is configured. Nice for testing without kinect: If kinect is not configured, don't use kinect stuff...
